title: Gamification-Based Creative Mathematical Problem-Solving Leadership Course

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level mathematics fundamentals and managerial experience
context.additional_context: Targeting mid-level managers/leaders responsible for corporate math education programs. This course enhances creative problem-solving skills using VR simulations and gamification elements.

learning_goals: Apply three or more creative mathematical problem-solving strategies in a VR-based simulation environment
Design a process to collaboratively solve complex mathematical problems with team members through gamification activities
Develop two or more creative teaching techniques applicable to mathematics education settings through formative assessment activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
